🇧🇭Lo de hoy duele. Tenía buenas sensaciones, pero un fallo técnico y se acabó. Viendo cómo ha ido luego y con 2 sets nuevos para Q3, creo que habríamos luchado por P4/P5. Duro, pero lo daremos todo para recuperarnos mañana!

#BahrainGP #FIAF2 #F2

Lap 4/23: DRS on the pit straight allows Nicholas to pass Schumacher on the inside and take P3!

#Barcelona #SpanishGP 🇪🇸 https://t.co/qISKmGz9ZE

Lap 34/37 - Zhou and Aitken battling for P2. Nicholas allowed to push on and now leads by 2.7 seconds. 

#Barcelona #SpanishGP 🇪🇸

Lap 33/37 - The front 2 pit and Nicholas takes P1. 4 laps to go! He's pushing now and extends his lead over Zhou to 1.7 seconds. 

#Barcelona #SpanishGP 🇪🇸

Lap 30/37 - The battle for technical P1 is on! Nicholas takes it on the first corner around the outside with the help of DRS. Great move! 

#Barcelona #SpanishGP 🇪🇸

Lap 29/37 - Nicholas is starting to increase the pressure on Zhou. He's 0.8 behind and closing quickly. 

#Barcelona #SpanishGP 🇪🇸

Lap 27/37 - The front markers starting to struggle on their old tyres and now taking their pit stops. Nicholas moves up to P5 with Hubert, King and Schumacher still to pit. 

#Barcelona #SpanishGP 🇪🇸

Lap 23/37 - Nicholas and Zhou are working their way through the field after their early pit stops. Now up to P6, 1.6 seconds behind Zhou. 

#Barcelona #SpanishGP 🇪🇸

Lap 18/37 - Nicholas has caught up with the first of the front six that haven't taken their pit stop yet. He passes Ragunathan for P7 still sitting behind Zhou. 

#Barcelona #SpanishGP 🇪🇸

Lap 14/37 - The front 6 yet to pit. Nicholas sitting comfortably in P8, focusing on tyre management at this stage of the race. 

#Barcelona #SpanishGP 🇪🇸

Lap 7/37 - Nicholas pits for a change to the hard compound rubber. He rejoins in P17.

#Barcelona #SpanishGP 🇪🇸 https://t.co/9YsHhOIi2n

Lap 4/37 - Safety car comes in and we're racing again! Nicholas has a look on the inside but settles behind Zhou into the first corner. 

#Barcelona #SpanishGP 🇪🇸

Lap 2/37 - Safety car comes out after Schumacher and Alesi both spin off track. Alesi is out of the race. Ghiotto also collected.

Lap 17: Nicholas really wants his first @FIA_F2 win! He's extended his lead to 3.4sec now...🇨🇦 #FIAF2

Chequered flag 🏁 under the Safety Car and Nicholas finishes P8 to collect the final point. Not the result he wanted, but a battling performance on track today. #F2 #MonacoGP 🇨🇦🏎 🇮🇩
Lap 28/30 No sooner is the Safety Car in than Fukuzumi and Ferrucci go off. Safety Car out again. Nicholas now P8 and in the points!  #F2 #MonacoGP 🇨🇦🏎 🇮🇩
Lap 24/30 Nicholas sets fastest lap of the race so far. #F2 #MonacoGP 🇨🇦🏎 🇮🇩
Lap 22/30 Boschung has stopped on track. VSC over and Nicholas is P12. #F2 #MonacoGP 🇨🇦🏎 🇮🇩
Lap 20/30 Russell puts his car into the wall near Rascasse. Virtual Safety Car. Nicholas pits for a set of supersofts. #F2 #MonacoGP 🇨🇦🏎 🇮🇩
Lap 15/30 We've reached the midway point and Nicholas remains P14, 1.4sec adrift of his DAMS team-mate Albon. #F2 #MonacoGP 🇨🇦🏎 🇮🇩
Lap 9/30 Safety Car in and we're racing again. Nicholas sitting P14. #F2 #MonacoGP 🇨🇦🏎 🇮🇩
Lap 5/30 Gelael crashes at la Piscine. Safety Car is out. #F2 #MonacoGP 🇨🇦🏎 🇮🇩
Lap 4/30 His car fixed, Nicholas rejoins in P15 and on a charge. He sets the fastest lap of the race. #F2 #MonacoGP 🇨🇦🏎 🇮🇩
Lap 1/30 Nicholas has damage to his car and is forced to pit. Makino and Ghiotto couldn't get away from the line and we have a Virtual Safety Car. #F2 #MonacoGP 🇨🇦🏎 🇮🇩

🔴🔴🔴🔴🔴 Lights out. We're racing! Nicholas cleanly away. Go on! 
#F2 #MonacoGP 🇨🇦🏎 🇮🇩

The Sprint Race is 21 laps and after the rain yesterday, the sun has made an appearance. #F2 #FrenchGP 🇫🇷🏎️🇨🇦

It’s 30 minutes until the start of the @FIA_F2 Sprint Race at @PaulRicardTrack and it’s Joe at the Twitter controls once again as Nicholas prepares for the race! #F2 #FrenchGP 🇫🇷🏎️🇨🇦

Well that was an eventful race! Always fun when you get to drive in the wet on slicks!😬😜Lots of action right up until the last lap and a good recovery to P8 after being hit off and dropping to the back!💪🏻🏁 On pole tomorrow! #F2 #FrenchGP https://t.co/DdrEOvuMkt
So pole position for Nicholas and @damsracing tomorrow! The @FIA_F2 Sprint Race gets underway at 12pm local time #F2 #FrenchGP 🇫🇷🏎️🇨🇦
🏁🏁🏁 What a final lap! Makino tries to steal away P8, but Nicholas goes up the inside at Signes and holds on to reverse grid pole tomorrow! #F2 #FrenchGP 🇫🇷🏎️🇨🇦
L29/30 - Nicholas is up to P8! He passes Fukuzumi and he's provisionally on pole for tomorrow's @FIA_F2 Sprint Race #F2 #FrenchGP 🇫🇷🏎️🇨🇦
L21/30 - Nicholas is having a great battle with Makino, he's holding onto P9 and two championship points #F2 #FrenchGP 🇫🇷🏎️🇨🇦
L16/30 - Nicholas' @damsracing team-mate Albon has had to make another stop, his car has gone into safety mode. Nicholas is now in P10. #F2 #FrenchGP 🇫🇷🏎️🇨🇦
L14/30 - VSC is ending now, Nicholas is in P12 but only two cars ahead have made their mandatory stop #F2 #FrenchGP 🇫🇷🏎️🇨🇦
L14/30 - Another VSC, Boschung has come to a halt on the pit straight #F2 #FrenchGP 🇫🇷🏎️🇨🇦
L13/30 - Nicholas comes into the pits to swap his super-softs for the medium compound @pirellisport tyre #F2 #FrenchGP 🇫🇷🏎️🇨🇦
L11/30 - A good battle with Ghiotto, Nicholas just runs wide at Signes and is down to P8 - for now. #F2 #FrenchGP 🇫🇷🏎️🇨🇦
L10/30 - We're back to green, VSC has ended #F2 #FrenchGP 🇫🇷🏎️🇨🇦
L9/30 - Geleal has spun and stalled so we're under Virtual Safety Car #F2 #FrenchGP 🇫🇷🏎️🇨🇦
L9/30 - Great move from Nicholas! He goes round the outside of De Vries and - combined with other cars spinning - he's up to P7! #F2 #FrenchGP 🇫🇷🏎️🇨🇦
L8/30 - Another position gained! Nicholas is in P10, he took advantage of a spin for Ghiotto ahead of him!
L7/30 - Drivers are starting to pit now, the Mistral Straight is getting very wet. Nicholas stays out and he's in P11 #F2 #FrenchGP 🇫🇷🏎️🇨🇦
L4/30 - Nicholas is up to P14, taking advantage of Fuoco having a stop/go penalty. Reports of rain in the third sector as well #F2 #FrenchGP 🇫🇷🏎️🇨🇦
L3/30 - Nicholas is picking up places, he's up to P15 now in his @damsracing car #F2 #FrenchGP 🇫🇷🏎️🇨🇦
L2/30 - Across the finish line for the first time, Nicholas is P17 and looking to regain positions. #F2 #FrenchGP 🇫🇷🏎️🇨🇦
Oh no, the wet track has caught out Nicholas - among other drivers - he makes a quick trip through the gravel but he's got going again #F2 #FrenchGP 🇫🇷🏎️🇨🇦
Lights go on...🔴🔴🔴🔴🔴 And they're out now!
Umbrellas are going up in the grandstands, it looks a bit of wet weather is coming to @PaulRicardTrack! 🌦️ #F2 #FrenchGP 🇫🇷🏎️🇨🇦
Just 10 minutes to go before the @FIA_F2 feature race! This will be the first time Nicholas has raced at @PaulRicardTrack since 2014! #F2 #FrenchGP 🇫🇷🏎️🇨🇦

Coming up is 30 laps of action at Circuit Paul Ricard and it is sure to be exciting. Nicholas will be starting P10 in his @DAMS Racing machine - a great opportunity to add to his points tally. #F2 #FrenchGP 🇫🇷🏎️🇨🇦

Formation lap completed and we're racing! #F2 #AustrianGP

🏁 Close! Chequered flag and it's P11 for Nicholas. #F2 #AustrianGP

So that wraps up an eventful @FIA_F2 weekend in Monza that returns P3 and P16 finishes. Stay tuned for reaction...#F2 #ItalianGP 🇨🇦
Chequered flag: A determined Nicholas brings his car home in P16. That front-end damage hurt him bad...#F2 #ItalianGP 🇨🇦
Final lap: Nicholas is desperately trying to limit the damage. He's now in P16...#F2 #ItalianGP 🇨🇦
Lap 20: Nicholas has front-end wing damage and is struggling for performance. He's slipped down to P12...#F2 #ItalianGP 🇨🇦
Lap 18: Matsushita nips down the inside of Nicholas at the second chicane and Leclerc follows soon afterwards. We're in P10...#F2 #ItalianGP
Lap 17: Oops! Nicholas out-brakes himself into the first chicane again. He loses a place and now sits P8...#F2 #ItalianGP 🇨🇦
Lap 15: Yes! Nicholas comes out in front as they head into the first chicane three abreast. He pips Leclerc and Markelov to reclain P7 #F2
Lap 14: Nicholas is now defending hard from championship leader Leclerc. It's crazy busy in the pack! #F2 #ItalianGP 🇨🇦
Lap 13: Markelov touches the back of Nicholas's car and then moves through to take our man's P7...#F2 #ItalianGP 🇨🇦
Lap 11: Merhi uses his DRS to edge past Nicholas and relegate our man down in to P7...#F2 #ItalianGP 🇨🇦
Lap 10: Nicholas remains P6 – in the middle of a huddle of drivers that all have DRS...#F2 #ItalianGP 🇨🇦
Lap 8: Oh no! Nicholas out-brakes himself into the first chicane and has to take the escape road. He rejoins in P6...#F2 #ItalianGP 🇨🇦
Lap 6: Nicholas is embroiled in a fierce battle with Galeal. He takes P4 but the loses it again without DRS... #F2 #ItalianGP 🇨🇦
Lap 4: Nicholas is pushing now. He sets his fastest lap of the race so far with a 1m 34.251s...#F2 #ItalianGP 🇨🇦
Lap 2: It's all very close. Nicholas looking comfortable in P6...#F2 #ItalianGP 🇨🇦
Lap 1: Nicholas makes it through the first sector safely. Currently P6...#F2 #ItalianGP 🇨🇦
Here we go...🔴🔴🔴🔴🔴....lights out.....GO!!! #F2 #ItalianGP
Okay, cars are on the grid...#F2 #Italian GP
Here we go, the @FIA_F2 formation lap is under way! #F2 #ItalianGP 🇨🇦
Nicholas has arrived on the @FIA_F2 grid and is ready to go from P6. Standby for the formation lap...#F2 #ItalianGP 🇨🇦
Thankfully, yesterday's rain has completely disappeared and it's wall-to-wall ☀️ this morning. Bring on the slicks! #F2 #ItalianGP 🇨🇦
The @FIA_F2 Sprint Race distance will be 21 laps of the super-fast Monza circuit where speeds peak at 205mph (330kmh)#F2 #ItalianGP 🇨🇦
An overnight promotion to P3 in yesterday's Feature means Nicholas will start the @FIA_F2 Sprint from P6 this morning...#F2 #ItalianGP 🇨🇦
Nicholas is getting suited and booted right now so it's Steve at the Twitter desk 💻 to update on events in Italy...#F2 #ItalianGP 🇨🇦

Tune in again tomorrow at 10.15 local for live updates from the @FIA_F2 Sprint. Nicholas will be targeting more points! #F2 #ItalianGP 🇨🇦
Nicholas's incredible P4 finish means he'll start tomorrow's Sprint Race from P5. And it looks like it will be dry – phew! #F2 #ItalianGP 🇨🇦
Well, it's been a long, ran-soaked day here at Monza. But that @FIA_F2 Feature Race was definitely worth waiting for! #F2 #ItalianGP 🇨🇦
Chequered flag: Nicholas crosses the line in P4! A terrific recovery from his P14 start slot. A cool head pays dividends...#F2 #ItalianGP 🇨🇦
Last lap: Leclerc and De Vries hit trouble and Nicholas leaps up to P4!! Amazing end to this race...#F2 #ItalianGP 🇨🇦
Lap 22: Nicholas drops a place on the frantic restart. But he fights back to retake P6 from Albon. Great job! #F2 #ItalianGP 🇨🇦
Lap 20: Nicholas is up to P6 now with the field bunched up for the re-start. Could be interesting last couple of laps...#F2 #ItalianGP 🇨🇦
Lap 19: Safety Car is out after Nicholas's team-mate, Rowland, loses a rear wheel. Sorry for the Briton. #F2 #ItalianGP 🇨🇦
Lap 18: The pit stops have equalised now and Nicholas is P9...#F2 #ItalianGP 🇨🇦
Lap 17: Nicholas darts in to the pits for fresh Pirelli rubber. The light is fading fast now. Rejoins in P11...#F2 #ItalianGP 🇨🇦
That should have been lap 16, BTW. Slip on the keyboard. Oops! #F2 #ItalianGP 🇨🇦
Lap 6: The pit stops have started, but Nicholas is staying out as long as possible. Will need to look after his rubber...#F2 #ItalianGP 🇨🇦
Lap 14: Merhi has entered the pits so Nicholas moves up to P7. Thanks for that, Roberto! #F2 #ItalianGP 🇨🇦
Lap 12: Fuoco and Nicholas both pass Delétraz. Our main is up to P8 and right on Fuoco's gearbox...#F2 #ItalianGP 🇨🇦
Lap 11: Nicholas is pushing very hard! His best lap is now down to 1m 50.194s. Fuoco and P8 are coming into range...#F2 #ItalianGP 🇨🇦
Lap 9: Nicholas goes two tenths faster. He's now 0.6sec behind Fuoco who occupies P8. Fighting hard! #F2 #ItalianGP 🇨🇦
Lap 8: Nicholas goes faster again. The track is drying now. Remains 1sec behind Fuoco...#F2 #ItalianGP 🇨🇦
Lap 7: Nicholas posts his fastest lap of the race so far with a 1m 51.350s. He's pushing as hard as he can in the wet...#F2 #ItalianGP 🇨🇦
Lap 5: Nicholas is looking good in P9. The race distance has been reduced from 30 to 23 laps, BTW...#F2 #ItalianGP 🇨🇦
Lap 3: Nicholas is battling hard with Fuoco, trying hard to steal his P8...#F2 #ItalianGP 🇨🇦
Lap 1: A safe start for Nicholas. He's up to P9 as they approach the end of the lap...#F2 #ItalianGP 🇨🇦

So, what to say about the season finale in Abu Dhabi? P3 in Qualifying and then, well, you can read the full story here: https://t.co/rKLskTJP8g  🇦🇪#AbuDhabiGP #F2 https://t.co/cfmoYBNDv7
🏁🏁🏁 Chequered flag, and it's P16 for Nicholas. Fair to say a frustrating weekend after P3 in Qualifying! 🇦🇪#AbuDhabiGP #F2
Lap 6/22. Nicholas records a 1:58.389, his quickest lap of the race so far. The gap to Lorando ahead 83.4sec. 🇦🇪#AbuDhabiGP #F2
Lap 3/22. VSC ending and we're underway again. Nicholas is P16 but almost two minutes adrift. 🇦🇪#AbuDhabiGP #F2
Lap 2/22. There's contact between Gelael and Kari. VSC is deployed. Nicholas is restarted and back on track - a lap down. 🇦🇪#AbuDhabiGP #F2
🔴🔴🔴🔴🔴 Lights out - and it's another disaster for Nicholas who stays on the line. 🇦🇪#AbuDhabiGP #F2
Start aborted. Gelael incorrectly positioned in his box. Cars set off for another formation lap - except Sette Camara who stalls in P16.  🇦🇪#AbuDhabiGP #F2
Nicholas cleanly away on the formation lap. Hot and sunny conditions. Air temp of 32.8°C and it's a windy day at Yas Marina. 🇦🇪#AbuDhabiGP #F2
After yesterday's drama, Nicholas will start this 22 lap Sprint Race - the last round of the season - from P18 on the grid. 🇦🇪#AbuDhabiGP #F2
Welcome from Abu Dhabi and the #F2 Sprint race. Nicholas - and his car - are back and ready for action. 💪🔥🔥 🇦🇪#AbuDhabiGP #F2

Well this was my race here. All zero seconds of it. Car stalled at the start and then got hit from behind. Thankfully both of us were ok but can’t say the same for our cars! Not how I imagined today to be... One last race to go for 2018, unfortunately starting from the back! https://t.co/LkRdbfJuRB

Nicholas 2/2: And what happened? "From my side it was just as simple as stalling. I'm not sure why, but even at full throttle I could feel the revs were much lower than normal. I'm really frustrated obviously, starting P3 I had it all to play for." 🇦🇪#AbuDhabiGP #F2
Nicholas 1/2: "I'm all fine, thankfully. I'm pretty sure whoever hit me got it a bit worse." 🇦🇪#AbuDhabiGP #F2
Nicholas's car in a very sorry state. It is being craned onto a truck after being slammed into by an unsighted Maini. 🇦🇪#AbuDhabiGP #F2
It's a huge relief to see Nicholas climb out of his wrecked car. He is walking back to the team garage. 🇦🇪#AbuDhabiGP #F2
🔴🔴🔴🔴🔴 Lights out and it's a disaster for Nicholas. His car didn't leave the line and he is collected from behind.
Formation lap underway. Nicholas will start on the red-walled supersoft tyres. 🇦🇪#AbuDhabiGP #F2
Coming up, 31 laps run under the lights. Nicholas lines up P3 on the grid for this one after a terrific Qualifying session yesterday. 🇦🇪#AbuDhabiGP #F2

Hello from Abu Dhabi! and the final countdown to race 23 of the F2 season. The Feature Race gets underway at 1840hrs, so it's Steve here at the controls while Nicholas makes his final preparations. 🇦🇪#AbuDhabiGP #F2

For clarity, as discussed with the stewards, the penalty was given for going too fast between T14 & T15 which isn’t where the tractor was, I slowed down, but not enough and I take the blame for it. (1/2)

Glad to go home safe tonight. For the respect of Jules, all his family and for our safety and the one of the marshals, there should never be any tractor nor marshals on track in such conditions with such poor visibility. Period.

L5/28: Nicholas is currently 3.1sec behind @FIA_F2 newcomer and race leader Palou...🇨🇦 #F2
L4/28: King's engine expires in a cloud of smoke and he loses second. That moves Nicholas up into P2...🇨🇦 #F2
L3/28: Nicholas remains in P3 – Markelov is on his gearbox and looking for a chance to pass. Nicholas neat and tidy...🇨🇦 #F2
L1/28: Great start by Nicholas! He pushes his way into P4 at Turn One and then takes P3. 🇨🇦 #F2

Results of the @FIA_F2 feature race at @circuitodejerez mean that Nicholas has consolidated fifth in the standings, now on 144 points. 🇨🇦
Nicholas was really unlucky in those closing laps. He had fresher tyres than the leaders, but found himself obstructed by backmarkers #f2.
A healthy 12 points from the Feature Race at Jerez. Nicholas was just 1.235sec from winning that race - it was that close! #F2 #Jerez
Chequered flag! What a breathtaking finish! Nicholas is P4 in a crazy race! He was desperately close to grabbing a podium finish. 🇨🇦😎💪🏎️👊
Final lap - Nicholas is fourth as the last lap begins!
L38/39 - Nicholas attacked for third position but was squeezed wide off the track - he drops to fifth place, but then gets up to fourth! 🇨🇦
L37/39 - the racing is manic! Nicholas is holding fourth place still. 🇨🇦
L36/39 - We are racing again, Nicholas is fourth, but there are backmarkers between him and the top three.
The safety car is about to come in - Nicholas will restart in fourth place. 🇨🇦💪😎
L35/39 - The safety car is out on track. It could be a thrilling finale to this race...
L34/39 - Nicholas is now up to fourth position in the race, but the cars have backed off because the safety car has been deployed. #F2
L33/39 - Wow, stunning stuff from Nicholas! He's now surged up to fifth place overall as the laps begin to count down.
L32/39 - Nicholas is one of the fastest drivers on the track as he gets himself up to sixth position in the race! #F2 🇨🇦
L30/39 - Now Nicholas has stormed up to seventh position. Sixth place isn't too far up the road either. Will his tyres hold out?🇨🇦💪💪 #F2
L29/39 - Nicholas moves up to eighth position with a determined pass down the inside. He's flying right now! 🇨🇦💪👊 #F2 #Jerez
L29/39 - Nicholas has caught up with the scrap for seventh and eighth places ahead of him! 💪🇨🇦👊
L28/39 - Nicholas is lapping faster than several drivers ahead of him in the race, but the challenge will be conserving those tyres! 🇨🇦
L26/29 - Nicholas has powered up to ninth position in the race - which is the position where he started on the grid! 🇨🇦😎
L25/39 - Nicholas has hauled himself back up to tenth place in the race. Still plenty of racing to go... 🇨🇦
L23/39 - Nicholas has moved back up to 11th position in the race, so a points-scoring finish is still a possibility. 🇨🇦💪
L22/39 - Nicholas has rejoined the race in 12th position. Can he make progress from there? 🇨🇦
L21/39 - Nicholas has come into the pits for his compulsory tyre change.
L20/39 - Nicholas has dropped to second place as Charles Leclerc goes past on fresher tyres, but Nicholas' focus is on tyre preservation. 🇨🇦
L19/39 - Nicholas is still in the lead as the race moves to half-distance. He'll be driving as hard as he dares on his worn tyres! 🇨🇦👊
L18/39 - Nicholas has increased his lead over the pack to 5.684sec now. How far into the race can he go on this set of medium tyres? #F2 🇨🇦
L16/39 - Race leader Nicholas has an advantage of 4.654sec now. #F2 #Jerez
L15/39 - Nicholas continues in the lead and stretches his advantage slightly. He needs to build a big advantage prior to his pitstop. 🇨🇦
L14/39 - Nicholas holds a 3.688sec advantage over the second-placed driver at the moment. His lap times are looking strong. 🇨🇦💪
L13/39 - Nicholas has assumed the lead of the race! Now how long can he stay out on the medium-compound tyres before pitting? 🇨🇦😎💪
L12/39 - Now Nicholas has improved to third position in the race. It's going to be interesting to see how this strategy plays out!🇨🇦
L11/39 - Nicholas is now up to fourth place and determined to take advantage of a clear track ahead of him. 🇨🇦💪😎
Lap 10/39 - Nicholas has moved up the order to sixth position. His choice of tyre strategy is paying off at the moment. 💪😀🇨🇦 #F2 #Jerez
Lap 8/39 - Some of Nicholas' rivals are starting to pit for new rubber. He's moved up to ninth place. Look for him to run long into the race
Lap 7/39 - Nicholas is in tenth, the third car in a close five-car train! 🇨🇦 🏎️
Lap 5/39 - Nicholas is tailing the drivers in eighth and ninth place. He's on a different tyre strategy, so needs to play a waiting game. 🇨🇦
Lap 4/39 - Nicholas remains in tenth position, in a gaggle of drivers covered by a couple of seconds on the track. 🇨🇦
Lap 3 - Nicholas remains in tenth position. The DRS overtaking system has been enabled, so let's see if progress can be made. #F2 🇨🇦💪🏎️
End of the opening lap and Nicholas is in tenth position. #Jerez #F2 🇨🇦
